activities: New Life Solution, Inc. (NLS) offers an online B2B service that helps companies measure, track, and reduce stress in the workplace. NLS surveys users and uses that data to create a user specific resiliency score with attendant strategies for increasing a users resiliency through specific skills and activities.
personaldata: We receive and store the information you voluntarily enter on the Website during the registration, subscription or assessment process or that you provide us any other way. For example, you may provide us with your name, gender, birthday, geographic location, job title, job description and related information, department, email, phone number, payment method, and billing information.
recoursemech: Better Business Bureau Safe Harbor Dispute Resolution Program
